parameters.name: BorderType
parameters.description: Type of border as defined by swGtolIndicatorBorderType_e

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Tolerance type as defined by swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Datum
parameters.description: Datum feature symbol that refers to the BorderType

title: IGtolFrame.AddIndicator
description: Adds a tolerance indicator to the end of the list of indicators to the right of this Gtol frame.
signature:
System.Boolean AddIndicator( 
   System.Int32
BorderType
,
   System.Int32
TolType
,
   System.String
Datum
)

parameters.name: BorderType
parameters.description: Type of border as defined by swGtolIndicatorBorderType_e

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Tolerance type as defined by swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Datum
parameters.description: Datum feature symbol that refers to the BorderType

returns: True if tolerance indicator successfully added, false if not
remarks:
Tolerance indicators:
define a tolerance zone within which a Gtol value applies.
are shown to the right of the main frame, but to the left of any text box for the first frame.
TolType may be one of only swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e.:
swGcsANG
swGcsPARALLEL
swGcsPERP
swGcsCIRCRUNOUT
swGcsSYMMETRY
